summary: New female face texture, normal and specular maps.
descriptionHtml:
Retexture of female faces.
Texture & specular for all humanoids, normal maps for humans only.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49716/?]MALE VERSION[/url]

[font="Impact"]Compatibility:[/font]
This mod is based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa and consist of the face texture only (no body).
So, it's HIGHLY recommended to install it over SG Female Textures mod and use Hello Santa's body texture. Otherwise, there will be visible edge between neck and body.

[font="Impact"]Installation[/font]
[b]Manual:[/b]
Unpack the mod's archive and copy "Data" folder to your Skyrim main folder.
Replace everything it could ask to replace.

[b]NMM:[/b]
Just open the archive withh NM Manager and activate by double-clicking on it.

[right][font="Impact"]Credits:[/font]
For head texture, normal and specular maps,
SG Female Textures Renewal
(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?)

For head colormap base + body normal map base,
CBBE skin texture V2 V3
plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554)

For head colormap,
Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents by pikkatze
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971)

For head normal map,
High-Res Female Nord Skin by nuska
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25531)[/right]
author: Fuse00
